channel.title: [PI] f*cking nubs
channel.description: some dumbass figured out how to ban people on my server..probably using a cheat client...soo how can i make it so only my client can connect?

item.title: [PI] f*cking nubs
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:19, topic:466639”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=583434.msg4160027#msg4160027 date=1353009593]
One thing you can do is set your clients uid to some number only you know.
[/quote]

You can assign a unique U.I.D.

[/quote]

haha sorry man i didn’t see that i guess credit on you both

@imstrength wrote:

[quote=“Aesyr, post:14, topic:466639”][quote author=All Time Low link=topic=583434.msg4157866#msg4157866 date=1352810824]
Some owners who code sources and release them usually leave a file name set to default staff and money leechers fail to fix that, then roachers know what source your using so they have the source also and login with the name that was set as default owner on the server…

Hope that helps.
[/quote]
Most people, however, are smart enough to delete the previous owners from every place in the source, including character files.[/quote]

which has been done. im no leech noob.

item.title: [PI] f*cking nubs
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

imstrength:

just a regular ban…but its weird…like he said i know there is no packet for “bans” just commands and i have no commands to ban people except ban which is set for mod+, and does this mean there is no way to make ONLY MY CLIENT work?

Yes, there are ways you can try to prevent Cheat Clients and 3rd-party programs from accessing your Private Server. There’s even a system in most 377 Bases to help prevent 3rd-party programs such as Cheat Engine. You can assign a unique U.I.D. so that only your Client can connect. There will always be the people looking to wreak havoc on your Server though. It doesn’t matter how many steps and countermeasures you take against them. If they want to cheat and exploit badly enough, they’re going to find a way to make it happen, captain.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] f*cking nubs
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

This is a prime example of why content should be created with fail-safes in mind when it comes to Private Servers. If you had a way of just blocking the content, you could keep everything running smoothly while you find the solution. Which type of a Ban is he exploiting?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] f*cking nubs
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

There is no way to ban people with a cheat client lol. There isn’t a packet for that. People will always find ways around whatever you do, so just take the safe route and block the packets that do things that could harm others. Then I guess change the port and IP of your client, and obfuscate.

Read full topic
